name: Tokyo Ghoul RE: Sky Fell in Sea (ver 1.0) JP
name_original: Tokyo Ghoul RE: Sky Fell in Sea (ver 1.0) JP
description:
This is a Tokyo Ghoul re rpg game made by myself.

Main characters are Ui Koori and Ihei Hairu. I love them so much and I feel like they need more love!

The story is developed around the battle with the Tsukiyamas (i.e. Rose) . There will be a route which completely displays what the manga does, but I decide that this is too sad and there should be alternative endings.

So! Based on your choice, will you be able to lead Koori and Hairu to a happy end?!

Although I finished this game, this is going to be the first version and is intended for bug exposing as in the short description. It doesn't mean I did not test the game myself, but there could be more potential bugs than I thought since I know what will come up next and would go straight to it.

Also, since no translator works for my game... I have to do it manually. That's why there's only a Japanese version. It's in Japanese just because it's easier for me to write the dialogue that is the best fit for the characters. I'm neither a native Japanese speaker no a native English speaker so potential mistakes are expected.
